properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 12:16PM CST until January 10 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northwestern Chase County in east central Kansas...
Southeastern Marion County in central Kansas...

* Until 115 PM CST.

* At 1212 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florence,
moving northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage
to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Florence, Bazaar, Elmdale, Cedar
Point, Hymer, Wonsevu, Tallgrass Prairie and Tallgrass Prairie
Preserve.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement
agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service
office in Wichita.

Torrential rainfall, some of it freezing, is occurring with this
severe thunderstorm and may cause flash flooding. Never drive your
vehicle through flooded roadways! Temperatures have just dropped
below freezing so roads and highways may quickly get slick.
